extendedInfo.description: Spotcycleâ¢ is a free multi-city GPS-enabled application that helps you maximize your bike-sharing experience. Track the statuses of bike stations around you and then pedal away to your next destination!For tips, instructions and more info, check out www.spotcycle.net. ** Weâre revamping Spotcycle and want your suggestions. Check out lab.spotcycle.net for more! **Follow us on our blog at blog.spotcycle.net, on Facebook www.facebook.com/Spotcycle, or on Twitter @Spotcycle.FEATURESAVAILABILITYâ¢	Displays bike and bike dock availability at bike stations. â¢	Pie chart icons indicate bike and bike dock availabilityâ¢	Displays the time of the last update below the titleâ¢	Search for stations by name, bike or bike dock availabilityâ¢	Search for stations by proximity to current location or to a point of interest provided by Google PlacesNEARBY BIKE STATIONSâ¢	Automatically lists the 10 stations closest to your current locationâ¢	Filtered search function automatically lists the 10 stations closest to your current location that meet the filter criteria (available bikes, bike docks, or stations); adjusts the list dynamically as your location changes.â¢	Displays units of measurement in metric or imperialBIKE PATHSâ¢	Toggle display of bike paths (where supported), bike stations or both with the layers featureâ¢	Displays bikes paths and lanes in supported cities (refer to www.spotcycle.net)BIKE ROUTESâ¢	Create and save personalized and/or thematic bike routesâ¢	Manage and edit your bike routes: annotate points of interest; add descriptions to bike routes and annotations.â¢	Share bike routes with other members or with your social media community (Facebook, Twitter, Google+ or email) and try out routes from other members.â¢	Review and revise bike routes during and/or after recording.FAVORITESâ¢	Create and group your favorite bike stations within a specified radius or by address. Synchronize favorites to Spotcycle.net accounts.LOCAL AMENITIESâ¢	Optimize biking directions using an address, your current position, a bike station, or a point of interestâ¢	Search for local businesses provided by Google PlacesTIMER AND ALARMâ¢	Keep track of your bike rental with a timer and alarmCUSTOMIZED DISPLAYâ¢	Choose and customize your map views and pinsâ¢	Supports landscape modeâ¢	Available in French and EnglishSUPPORTâ¢	Easy email access to contact Spotcycle team and supported bike share schemes for supportSpotcycleâ¢ supports the following popular bike-sharing schemes as well as many others. For the complete list of supported schemes, visit spotcycle.net.Australia- Melbourne, VIC (Melbourne Bike Shareâ¢)Canada- Montreal, QC (BIXI Montrealâ¢) - Ottawa-Gatineau, ON-QC (Capital BIXIâ¢) - Toronto, ON (BIXI Torontoâ¢) United Kingdom- London (Barclays Cycle Hireâ¢) United States- Boston, MA (Hubwayâ¢) - Chicago, IL (Divvy Bikesâ¢)- Minneapolis, MN (Nice Ride Minnesotaâ¢) - New York City, NY (Citi Bikeâ¢)- Washington DC/Arlington VA, USA (Capital Bikeshareâ¢)- Most B-Cycleâ¢ and DecoBikeâ¢ bike share schemes

reviews.comment: Great way to find nearby bikes and dropoff points in real time. A+
reviews.author: Tom H

reviews.title: Crashes on startup
reviews.comment: Crashes on startup with Nexus 7 (1st gen) running Android 4.3. Until this gets fixed I can\'t even begin to rate how useful the application is.
reviews.author: Michael Dinsmore

reviews.comment: Fun to watch other cities.
reviews.author: Mary Arneson

reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Santiago Perez

reviews.title: Great app for NYC Citibike
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app in NYC since Citibike launched. Love it! It\'s great to see the number of bikes and docks for each station right on the map at the same time. I baldy love that you can manually refresh it. I wish they used the updated Google maps api and also included NYC bike paths, but other than that, great app!
reviews.author: Chris Williams

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: Very useful. I just downloaded to use with the Bikeshare in Washington DC, since I\'ll be there on business. Wish it had the Google Map Directions by bike feature, so I could see what docks are along the proposed route.
reviews.author: Darren Bartels

reviews.title: Great app with one annoying bug
reviews.comment: I love bike sharing and this app is very helpful. The only problem is that there\'s an annoying bug whereby pressing the back button on my phone causes the app to exit.
reviews.author: Jeremy Andrews

reviews.title: Great app! Will be 5 stars when...
reviews.comment: HD icon and widgets are missing. Apart from that it\'s really the best!
reviews.author: Tristan Schirmann

reviews.title: Great options!
reviews.comment: Over all great app. Bike docks very accurate. Always helpful to find close by docks.
reviews.author: David Alvarez

reviews.title: Good for locations, number always wrong.
reviews.comment: I use this app for capital bike share in DC. It\'s great for locating stations. But the number of bikes is always horribly wrong. Sometimes it says 17 when there is 0.
reviews.author: Sherriff S

reviews.title: Most clear, accurate and comprehensive
reviews.comment: It\'s the Most clear, accurate and comprehensive of all the apps. Don\'t bother with the others
reviews.author: Eff Jay

reviews.comment: Empty, though active stations don\'t always shoe up in list or on map.
reviews.author: Whitney Flohr

reviews.title: Great app, neat update with a bit of a fault
reviews.comment: I love this app, been using it for nearly a year in Toronto and their bixi system. The new update made it easy to see how many bikes are available on the map view without needing to click the station. Only fault is that if that station doesn\'t have any bikes it doesn\'t show the station at all. I understand that you don\'t need to know about that station if you need a bike so it shows ones that have some, but I use the app plenty enough of times to see if there are stations with any spaces for the bike I\'m riding. Usually I know the stations around me but sometimes I go to an area I don\'t normally use so it\'d be good to know that the station does exist for me to unload the bike.  You can switch the view to the older red circles and dots, which I\'ll probably be doing for the time being. So it\'s not a huge loss.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stations disappear
reviews.comment: On multiple occasions today the Newbury / Hereford station disappeared both off the app map and off the list of stations. I don\'t understand.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good job
reviews.comment: Functional, attractive, simple. Great job! Only gripe is that the app icon is pretty low-res
reviews.author: Anton Lodder

reviews.title: Mixed bag.
reviews.comment: I use it every day.  This new version (9/2012) is a huge improvement.  I love the new map with the pie charts for each station.  Much more responsive.  It kept my old favorites, too.    However... Why on Earth does spotcycle need the \"directly call phone numbers\" permission?? The change log should mention this.  This must be a bug, right?  Also...  A feature request for the new version of Spotcycle:  Can you please bring back the feature of having the favorites list be the first thing displayed when launching the app?  In the new version, I have to tap the menu, tap favorites, tap List view, and then tap my only favorites group.  Any chance a preference or setting can be built in to set the default screen to not be the map of all stations everywhere?  I would assume that the vast majority of users are ones who are regular riders and only care about certain stations, hence the awesomeness of having the favorites screen...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great success
reviews.comment: The developers accepted our feedback and polished the permissions. Very nice of them, thanks. The app is excellent now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Favourites
reviews.comment: Just downloaded the latest version, looks like a major rework, where have the favourites gone?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent & accurate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice, minor issues
reviews.comment: In Boston, stations with zero bikes aren\'t showing up on the map at all.
reviews.author: A Google User
